backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining product, enquiry, feedback, message, user profile types, storage maps, authorization helpers, and comparison utilities for sorting.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming old actor state to new format, mainly updating admin passkey while preserving stored maps and settings.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files and components involved in admin passkey UI updates and passkey‑only verification changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing UI pages, components, hooks, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata, favicon, and mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router, theme provider, and all public and admin routes with admin route guarding.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling login state, error recovery, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, and a credits section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Provides the main page layout with navigation, footer, WhatsApp button, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Implements the top navigation bar with responsive menus, links, and a login button.
frontend/src/components/whatsapp/WhatsAp: Shows a floating WhatsApp contact button using site settings for phone and prefilled message.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for admin checks, passkey verification, and fetching or saving the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data-fetching and mutation hooks for products, enquiries, feedback, messages, and site settings using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme color variables and base utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that initializes React, sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing products, enquiries, and settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEnquiriesP: Fetches and displays all enquiries in a table with customer details and order info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFeedbackPa: Shows all customer feedback submissions in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin layout that renders navigation and routes to products, enquiries, feedback, or messages pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMessagesPa: Displays contact form messages in a table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages products with listing and a dialog for adding new items including photo upload.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRouteGuard: Protects admin routes with authentication, admin checks, and optional passkey verification.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin panel component for editing site settings including certifications, contact info, WhatsApp config, Google Maps embed, and pricing table.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminTwoStepAcc: UI card that prompts the user for an admin passkey and triggers verification with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdvantagesPage.tsx: Displays a grid of HDPE pipe advantages with icons and descriptions, setting the page title on load.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with fields, validation, mock submission handling, and company contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage with hero, features, about section, and navigation buttons, setting the document title on load.
frontend/src/pages/OrderEnquiryPage.tsx: Order/enquiry form allowing users to submit pipe orders or quotes with validation, file upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product listings with images, details, loading skeletons, and availability indicators.
Displays a list of HDPE pipe applications with icons and descriptions using cards.
frontend/src/utils/adminCredentials.ts: Empty utility file placeholder for admin credential helpers.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Utility for storing and managing admin unlock state and passkey in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing admin passkey-only authentication changes and known issues.
